body:
Select  P.ProsesAdi, SA.SeriID
From    IT06_StokAmbar SA
        Inner Join IT01_Prosesler P On P.GirenAmbarID = SA.AmbarID
Where   P.ProsesID In (100, 101)
        And Not Exists (Select  GMM.SeriID From IT07_GerGirenMalzemeD GGMD Inner Join IT07_GerGirenMalzemeM GMM On GMM.GirenID = GGMD.GirenID Where GMM.SeriID = SA.SeriID)
        And Not Exists (Select  SeriID From IT08_TSeriM TSM Where   TSM.GirenSeriID = SA.SeriID)


Select PRD.IsEmriNo,PRMMK.SeriID,SA.Miktar_Mt, * FROM  IT05_PartiRotaM PRM
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM_MamulKumas PRMMK On PRMMK.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaD PRD On PRD.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo
INNER JOIN IT01_Prosesler PP On PP.ProsesID = PRD.ProsesID
INNER JOIN IT06_StokAmbar SA On SA.SeriID = PRMMK.SeriID And SA.AmbarID = PP.GirenAmbarID
Where PRD.ProsesID = 100 And PRD.Durumu  =0 And Not Exists(SELECT * FROM  IT08_TSeriM TSM Where TSM.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo)
